paragraph1A: We inform you, pursuant to art. 13 Legislative Decree 30.06.2003, n. 196, regarding “Information”, that the personal data provided to the Agricultural Company Roccolo del Lago Srl, or otherwise acquired by the same for commercial, sales, promotion and statistical purposes, in compliance with the legislative and contractual provisions in force, may be subject to treatment, in compliance with the aforementioned legislation and confidentiality obligations.
